text:
On April 28 don't miss the opportunity to learn more about Covid-19 vaccines. @JohnSMcConnell, Editor-in-Chief of @TheLancetInfDis, will join the discussion & address recent concerns. Save your seat: https://t.co/wgFnO2WeAL

#COVID19 #Vaccine #VaccinesWork #WorldImmunizationWeek https://t.co/eHerD9BF0d
